items.description: Agent context: Supports anxiety reduction goal + running habit streak (day 12). HRV baseline good  green light for moderate intensity.

items.description:
Agent context: Scheduled during your peak HRV window (9am1pm). Do not move. Covers Krebs cycle, enzyme kinetics, and regulation  highest-yield exam topics based on syllabus scan.

Focus mode: ON. Phone silenced. Website blockers active.

private.soma_agent_reason: Peak HRV cognitive window  highest ROI study block of the week

items.description: Agent context: No screens after this point. Protecting 8hr sleep target ahead of study-heavy Tuesday. Magnesium, reading, dim lights only.

private.soma_agent_reason: Sleep goal protection  8hr minimum before pre-travel day

items.description: Agent context: Low-intensity only. Flashcard review + concept mapping. No new material. Pre-travel schedule  cognitive load ceiling is lower today. Stop at 60 min regardless.

private.soma_agent_note: Pre-travel  do not extend this block

items.description: Agent context: You mentioned wanting to call her before the flight  this is your last realistic window. Flight is at 2pm. ~20 min buffer after call before you need to leave for airport.

private.soma_agent_reason: User mentioned calling mom before flight  surfaced from conversation history 2026-02-28

items.description:
Agent context: Cabin pressure + dehydration will suppress HRV for ~46hrs post-landing. Arrival ~7pm. No study after landing. Hydrate on plane. Sleep target still 10pm.

Flight: DL 2847 | Terminal B | Bag: carry-on only

private.soma_agent_reason: HRV impact window flagged  46hr cognitive recovery expected post-landing

items.description: Agent context: Non-negotiable. 16 hours before exam. Sleep quality at this stage matters more than any additional review. Agent will not schedule anything after 9pm tonight.

Agent context: Timed to end of 90-min sleep cycle (estimated cycle 5 completion ~6:52am). Alarm set for 7am. High-protein breakfast supports sustained focus. No caffeine until 8:30am to avoid cortisol spike stacking.

Suggested: eggs + greek yogurt + water before anything else.

private.soma_agent_reason: Sleep cycle optimization  wake timed to cycle 5 end based on 10pm sleep onset

items.description:
Agent context: This is the north star event. Every block this week has been built around this. You've hit your study targets. Trust the prep.

Location: Hartley Hall 101 | Bring: ID, pencils, calculator (approved list)
Arrival: 8:45am  do not be late.

private.soma_agent_note: All week's scheduling decisions derived from this event

items.description:
Agent context: Post-exam recovery dip typically hits 1824hrs after high-stress event. You may feel a motivational crash Wednesday evening or Thursday morning  this is normal. Prepare your portion today (Wed afternoon) while adrenaline is still available.

Group: Jamie, Priya, Marcus | Slides due by 8am Thu

private.soma_agent_reason: Post-exam recovery dip monitoring  agent watching energy levels

items.description:
Agent context: Flagged as a recovery and reward anchor. Exam is done. Presentation is done. This matters  don't cancel it, don't be late, don't bring your laptop.

Agent note: No study blocks scheduled Friday. You've earned this.
